item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 9, 2025 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. YouTube, when the walls fell [video] (24 points | 19 comments)

25. Ultrasonic deep drawing cuts friction by 20%, extends tool lifespan (92 points | 27 comments)
26. The trap of the top-down approach (9 points | discuss)

29. An epic treatise on error models for systems programming languages (198 points | 64 comments)
